channel.title: Placing .cfg files into a folder?
channel.description:
***************** EDit: I have already found out what to do. i need to look into each .java file i got that are related to the cfg files and change there paths.. *****************
What do i have to edit in my client.java to be able to put my cfg files into folders?
now all my cgf files are in the same folder as all my other files. But i want them to be in seperate folders.
like Speed-pk (source folder) Speed-pk -> config -> (cfg's here)
well actualy i want to make Speed-pk -> Config -> Shops -> Shops.cfg Speed-pk -> Config -> NPc -> Spawns.cfg
And so on and so on....
Can anyone help me on this ? i am using a spartanScape source that was made with mod taharoks Source builder.

item.title: Placing .cfg files into a folder?
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

b0sman:

hmm… i don’t think its smart to do that

Please hold your opinion for your self please…
And its verry smart to do that.
your server folder is bether organized then.
and it makes it easyer to find things.

Read full topic

item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

EDit: I have already found out what to do.
i need to look into each .java file i got that are related to the cfg files and
change there paths…

What do i have to edit in my client.java to be able to put my cfg files into folders?

now all my cgf files are in the same folder as all my other files.
But i want them to be in seperate folders.

like
Speed-pk (source folder)
Speed-pk -> config -> (cfg’s here)

well actualy i want to make
Speed-pk -> Config -> Shops -> Shops.cfg
Speed-pk -> Config -> NPc -> Spawns.cfg

And so on and so on…

Can anyone help me on this ?
i am using a spartanScape source that was made with mod taharoks Source builder.
